attributes.action: Why cant i join armed forces due to a criminal record?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to join the millitary and i have been refused as i have a crminal record none of my charges have been violent. I am on the dole and want to do something for my country so i thought i would join up. I keep hearing that we need more soldiers on the ground and i would like to be one of them. I need a solution to get in the army as quick as possible as there is nothing for me to do here.
